moves.1... d6: Already setting up a cramped position.
moves.2... Nd7: Very bad. Now White can seize control at once.
moves.3... g6: 3... P-K4! would at least put up a fight.
moves.4. Nf3: Threatening 5 N-N5 with irresistable pressure on KB7.
moves.5... Kxf7: 5... K-B1 woukd drag things out a bit longer.
moves.6. Ng5+: Black can now either lose his Queen or his King.
moves.6... Kf6: If the K returns to the 1st rank, 7 N-K6 wins the Q. So Black plays this move...
